channel.title: Scanning on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Scanning on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Pi Guard
item.description: Pi Guard Pi Guard was a hackathon project focused on filling the gap between consumer security options for personal computers and comparable offerings for embedded and internet of things products. The device hosts a simple web application which acts as a wrapper for a number of automated scans that take place on the local IP range. The automated scans are designed to be modular and flexible so that multiple ‘plugins’ might be written for the platform and the UI is oriented towards non-technical users.
